logo.name: ./listFrom

linkItems.name: ./linkItems

showDescription.fieldDescription: Show descriptions of the link item

fragmentpath.fieldDescription: Choose the variant to be displayed by this experience fragment
fragmentpath.name: ./fragmentPath

navigationRoot.fieldDescription: The root page from which to build the navigation. Can be a blueprint master, language master or regular page.
navigationRoot.name: ./navigationRoot

structureStart.fieldDescription: The levels below the navigation root that are to be excluded. To include the navigation root, enter 0.
structureStart.name: ./structureStart

collectAllPages.fieldDescription: Collect all pages that are descendants of the navigation root.
collectAllPages.name: ./collectAllPages

structureDepth.fieldDescription: Depth of the navigation structure relative to the navigation root.
structureDepth.name: ./structureDepth
